languages.text: Лорд-капитан бросил{mf|ся|ась} вперед, увлекая за собой солдат, и жуткая тень заступила им дорогу. Снег и тьма скрывали ее, превращая в едва различимый силуэт, источающий обещание смерти.

The Lord Captain charges forward, {mf|his|her} soldiers rushing after {mf|him|her}, and an eerie shadow blocks their path. It is cloaked by the snow and the dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан бросил{mf|ся|ась} вперед, увлекая за собой солдат, и жуткая тень заступила им дорогу. Снег и тьма скрывали ее, превращая в едва различимый силуэт, источающий обещание смерти.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain charges forward, {mf|his|her} soldiers rushing after{mf|him|her}, and an eerie shadow blocks their path. It is cloaked by the snow and the dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

The Lord Captain charges forward, {mf|his|her} soldiers rushing after{mf|him|her}, and an eerie shadow blocks their path. It is cloaked by the snow and the dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

The Lord Captain charges forward, {mf|his|her} soldiers rushing after{mf|him|her}, and an eerie shadow blocks their path. It is cloaked by the snow and the dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

The Lord Captain charges forward, {mf|his|her} soldiers rushing after{mf|him|her}, and an eerie shadow blocks their path. It is cloaked by the snow and the dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

languages.text: 舰长大人冲在前面，{mf|他|她}的士兵紧随其后。某个诡异的阴影拦住了他们的去路。阴影隐藏在大雪与黑暗之中，变成了一个几乎无法辨别的轮廓，散发着死亡的气息。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain charges forward, {mf|his|her} soldiers rushing after {mf|him|her}, and an eerie shadow blocks their path. It is cloaked by the snow and the dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人冲在前面，{mf|他|她}的士兵紧随其后。某个诡异的阴影拦住了他们的去路。阴影隐藏在大雪与黑暗之中，变成了一个几乎无法辨别的轮廓，散发着死亡的气息。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンが進軍すると、その後ろに兵が急いで続く。すると不気味な影が行く手を塞ぐ。雪と闇をまとった影はかろうじて識別できる程度のシルエットとなり、逃れられない死の臭いを漂わせている。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain charges forward, {mf|his|her} soldiers rushing after {mf|him|her}, and an eerie shadow blocks their path. It is cloaked by the snow and the dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンが進軍すると、その後ろに兵が急いで続く。すると不気味な影が行く手を塞ぐ。雪と闇をまとった影はかろうじて識別できる程度のシルエットとなり、逃れられない死の臭いを漂わせている。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán avanza con sus soldados detrás hasta que una sombra espeluznante les impide el paso. Al ocultarse entre la nieve y la oscuridad, se tronca en una silueta apenas perceptible que emana la promesa de la muerte.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain charges forward, {mf|his|her} soldiers rushing after {mf|him|her}, and an eerie shadow blocks their path. It is cloaked by the snow and the dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán avanza con sus soldados detrás hasta que una sombra espeluznante les impide el paso. Al ocultarse entre la nieve y la oscuridad, se tronca en una silueta apenas perceptible que emana la promesa de la muerte.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} charge droit devant, {mf|suivi|suive} par ses soldats, jusqu'à ce qu'une ombre sinistre leur barre la route. La silhouette dont émane une promesse de mort est tout juste perceptible à travers la neige et l'obscurité qui la dissimulent.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain charges forward, {mf|his|her} soldiers rushing after {mf|him|her}, and an eerie shadow blocks their path. It is cloaked by the snow and the dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} charge droit devant, {mf|suivi|suive} par ses soldats, jusqu'à ce qu'une ombre sinistre leur barre la route. La silhouette dont émane une promesse de mort est tout juste perceptible à travers la neige et l'obscurité qui la dissimulent.

languages.text: Der Lord Captain stürmt voran, gefolgt von {mf|seinen|ihren} Soldaten, als ein unheimlicher Schatten ihnen den Weg versperrt. Schnee und Dunkelheit umgeben ihn und bilden eine kaum wahrnehmbare Silhouette, die den sicheren Tod ankündigt.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain charges forward, {mf|his|her} soldiers rushing after {mf|him|her}, and an eerie shadow blocks their path. It is cloaked by the snow and the dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain stürmt voran, gefolgt von {mf|seinen|ihren} Soldaten, als ein unheimlicher Schatten ihnen den Weg versperrt. Schnee und Dunkelheit umgeben ihn und bilden eine kaum wahrnehmbare Silhouette, die den sicheren Tod ankündigt.

languages.text: Hücuma kalkan Lord Kaptan ile peşinden giden askerleri, ürpertici bir düşmanla karşılaşıyor. Ona yaklaşanlara ölüm vaadinde bulunan varlık, yoğun kar ve karanlığın içinde zar zor seçiliyor.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain charges forward, {mf|his|her} soldiers rushing after {mf|him|her}, and an eerie shadow blocks their path. It is cloaked by the snow and the dark, which turn it into a barely discernible silhouette that emanates the promise of death.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan hücum etti, askerleri de peşinden geldi ve ürpertici bir düşman yollarını kesti. Kar ve karanlıkla gizlenen düşman; etrafına ölüm vaadi yayan, zar zor görülebilen bir silüete bürünmüştü.
